price: those who convey the messages of Allah[37] and fear Him, and they do not fear anyone except Allah. And sufficient is Allah as a Reckoner.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ حَسِيبٗا
footnotes: [37] i.e., the prophets and their followers who honestly convey Allah’s message to the people.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuballighūna risālāti al-lahi wayakhshawnahu walā yakhshawna aḥadan illā al-laha wakafā bil-lahi ḥasīban
